message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to pay a bit less. How about $85?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we try $92?
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but $92 is still a bit high for me. How about we settle at $88?
I understand your concerns, Bob. I'm willing to give a bit more. How about we try $95?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  $95 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $90.  Is that something we can work with?
I'm getting close to my minimum, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $92 again. It's my final offer.
Alice, I understand you're getting close to your minimum. I'm willing to go up to $91. This is my final offer.
I'm not willing to go any higher, Bob. I'm going to have to pass on your offer. I'll consider selling to John for $80 instead.
